product_name: adidas Terrex Ndosphere Hoodie Jacket - Men's
long_description: Wear the adidasTerrex Ndosphere PrimaLoft(R) hoodie for men as a warm outer or mid layer when tackling alpine summits and other athletic pursuits in cold weather. Main body and hood feature 80g PrimaLoft Sport synthetic insulation for warmth. Soft PrimaLoft(R) Sport feels like goose down but continues to work even if wet; dries quickly, too. Sides, underarms and upper back feature 80g PrimaLoft Synergy panels for insulated stretch comfort. Inner knit lining contains cocona (made from coconuts) to improve overall wicking, breathability and warmth. Hood is closely fitted and adjustable; jacket has adjustable hem and elasticized cuffs. Zippered handwarmer pockets; 1 zippered chest pocket. The adidas Terrex Ndosphere PrimaLoft hoodie for men is cut for excellent freedom of motion.
